name: YTD WO Water Drained
query:
select lst.name as "Entry:Data:200",lst.date as "Date:Date:100",lst.item as "Item:Data:200",lst.qty as "Qty:Float:100" from 
((select re.name as "name",re.posting_date as "date",itm.item_name as "item",ABS(itm.quantity_difference) as "qty" 
from `tabStock Reconciliation` re left join `tabStock Reconciliation Item`  itm on itm.parent = re.name 
where re.docstatus=1 and   re.company='Dure Oil Middle East Factory - Sole Proprietorship LLC' and  re.purpose='Stock Reconciliation' and itm.quantity_difference<0
and itm.item_code ='wo001' and YEAR(re.posting_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()))
UNION
(select st.name as "name",st.posting_date as "date",itm.item_name as "item",itm.transfer_qty as "qty"
from `tabStock Entry` st left join `tabStock Entry Detail`  itm on itm.parent = st.name
where st.docstatus=1 and st.company='Dure Oil Middle East Factory - Sole Proprietorship LLC' and  itm.expense_account='501613 - Temp-Water Drained Out From Waste Oil - DURE' 
and itm.item_code ='wo001' and YEAR(st.posting_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()))) lst
